Description: I rent furnished. Two newly built bedrooms (upstairs) and two bathrooms are fully available, as in the pictures. Hill site with long views. Corner of 2 tree-lined side streets. Brick residence. Hardwood floors, sun exposures, views of gardens. Close to Watertown & Belmont shops, restaurants. Tenant responsible for all utilities: gas, electric, water, and internet. (add 250 per month)
